description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国企业家，创维数码创始人兼前主席、主要股东、房地产开发商。曾任第十届全国政协委员、第八届广东省政协委员、第三届深圳市政协常委。
description.en: An entrepreneur from the People's Republic of China, founder and former chairman, major shareholder of Skyworth Digital, and a real estate developer. He served as a member of the 10th National Committee of the CPPCC, a member of the 8th Guangdong Provincial Committee of the CPPCC, and a member of the Standing Committee of the 3rd Shenzhen Municipal Committee of the CPPCC.

description.zh-cn: 由黄宏生创立的消费电子产品公司。
description.en: A consumer electronics company founded by Huang Hongsheng.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议第十届全国委员会委员的统称。
description.en: A collective term for the members of the 10th National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

en: Guangdong Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议广东省委员会。
description.en: The Guangdong Provincial Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

en: Shenzhen Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议深圳市委员会。
description.en: The Shenzhen Municipal Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国广州市的一所公立研究型大学。
description.en: A public research university located in Guangzhou, China.

en: South China Electronics Import and Export Company

description.en: The stock exchange of Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 黄宏生胞弟，创维数码前执行董事。
description.en: Younger brother of Huang Hongsheng and former executive director of Skyworth Digital.

description.zh-cn: 1988年，黄宏生移居香港后创业，成立了创维数码。
description.en: In 1988, after moving to Hong Kong, Huang Hongsheng started his own business and founded Skyworth Digital.

description.zh-cn: 黄宏生是创维数码的创始人兼前主席。
description.en: Huang Hongsheng is the founder and former chairman of Skyworth Digital.

description.zh-cn: 黄宏生因串谋盗窃及串谋诈骗创维数码5000多万港元，于2006年7月13日被判监禁6年。
description.en: On July 13, 2006, Huang Hongsheng was sentenced to 6 years in prison for conspiracy to steal and defraud Skyworth Digital of over 50 million Hong Kong dollars.

position.en: Standing Committee Member of the 3rd Committee

description.zh-cn: 毕业于无线电工程专业。
description.en: Graduated with a major in Radio Engineering.

position.zh-cn: 助理工程师、常务副总经理
position.en: Assistant Engineer, Executive Deputy General Manager

description.zh-cn: 黄宏生曾在华南电子进出口公司任职，从助理工程师晋升为常务副总经理。
description.en: Huang Hongsheng worked at South China Electronics Import and Export Company, where he was promoted from Assistant Engineer to Executive Deputy General Manager.

description.zh-cn: 2000年，创维数码在香港交易所上市。
description.en: In 2000, Skyworth Digital was listed on the Hong Kong Stock Exchange.

description.zh-cn: 黄培升是黄宏生的胞弟。
description.en: Huang Peisheng is the younger brother of Huang Hongsheng.

description.zh-cn: 黄培升因串谋盗窃及串谋诈骗创维数码5000多万港元，于2006年7月13日被判监禁6年。
description.en: On July 13, 2006, Huang Peisheng was sentenced to 6 years in prison for conspiracy to steal and defraud Skyworth Digital of over 50 million Hong Kong dollars.
